name: Ch.12ABaseConvo5
_source: speak;Forde;Hmm...|No, that shade isn't quite right...|Maybe a touch more yellow ochre...
speak;Artur;Oh!|Sorry to disturb you, Forde. I was just passing by.
speak;Artur;Did you... just hide your painting?
speak;Forde;What? No!|Well, yes, but it's nothing, really.|Just a little sketch. Not worth looking at.
speak;Artur;I've heard your work is quite good.|Sir Kyle showed some of your landscapes to Brother Moulder and me.
speak;Forde;Kyle and his big mouth...|Those were just practice pieces.
speak;Artur;They were beautiful.|The way you captured the light on the mountains...|It reminded me of dawn prayers at the temple.
speak;Forde;You really think so?|I mean, thank you, but...|Wait, could you stand right there for a moment?
speak;Forde;Nothing's wrong at all!|Just... don't move for a second.
speak;Forde;Perfect!|The way the light is hitting your robes right now...
speak;Forde;Would you mind terribly if I... sketched you?|Just quickly! Nobody has to see it!
speak;Artur;Sketch me?|But why would you want to do that?

speak;Forde;To be honest, I've been struggling with drawing fabric.|Armor is easy - it's all rigid lines and reflections.|But those flowing robes of yours... they're a challenge I haven't mastered yet.
speak;Artur;I see...|I suppose I could stand here for a while, if it would help.
speak;Forde;You would?|That's fantastic!|But, um, could we keep this between us?
speak;Forde;The others... they don't exactly appreciate me "wasting time" with art.|Kyle especially gives me grief about not focusing on training.
speak;Artur;I understand.|Your secret is safe with me, Forde.
speak;Lute;Artur?|Why are you standing so unnaturally?
speak;Artur;Lute!|I was just... stretching?|Yes, stretching after morning meditation.
speak;Lute;That's anatomically inefficient for proper muscular elongation.|I've memorized seventeen stretching techniques from eastern Renais, and none look like that.
speak;Forde;I was just showing him a cavalry stance.|For self-defense purposes.
speak;Lute;Intriguing.|Though Artur's body type would be better suited to a different defensive posture, considering his muscle-to-height ratio.
speak;Artur;Thank you, Lute, but we were just finishing up.
speak;Lute;Very well.|I require your assistance with a tome translation in approximately 12 minutes.
speak;Artur;You don't know the half of it.|Shall we continue while we have the chance?
speak;Forde;That should do it!|Thank you for your patience, Artur.
speak;Artur;You're quite welcome.|Might I... see what you've created?
speak;Forde;Oh!|Well, it's not really finished yet...|It's just a rough sketch, really...
speak;Artur;I understand if you'd rather keep it private.|Art can be a personal matter, like prayer.
speak;Forde;No, it's just...|Fine, but remember, it's not my best work.
speak;Artur;Forde, this is...|This is remarkable.|You've made me look so... peaceful.
speak;Forde;It's how you appeared to me.|There's a certain calmness about you that I wanted to capture.
speak;Artur;I'm honored you would see me this way.|And that you would share your gift with me, despite wanting to keep it secret.
speak;Forde;Keep this between us?|If General Seth or Kyle found out I was "wasting time" painting during a war...
speak;Artur;It will be our secret.|But Forde, this isn't wasting time.|Beauty and art have their place, even in war.|Perhaps especially in war.
speak;Forde;Thanks, Artur.|Would you like to keep it?|Think of it as payment for your patience.
speak;Artur;I would treasure it.|And perhaps someday, when this conflict is over...|You won't need to hide your talents anymore.
speak;Forde;One can hope.|Until then, mum's the word, right?
speak;Artur;Your secret is safe with me.|May the divine continue to guide your hand, Forde.
